Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.controller

Class StartViewControllerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.batallanaval.controller.StartViewControllerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStartViewController
Direct Known Subclasses:
StartViewController
public abstract class StartViewControllerAdapter extends Object implements IStartViewController
Abstract controller class for the start view of the Battleship game.

This class provides the logic for handling the main buttons: "Start Play", "Continue Play", "Instructions", and "Exit". It also initializes the file handlers used to save and load game data.

Implements IStartViewController and uses JavaFX annotations.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n

    • handlePlay

      public void handlePlay(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event when the "Start Play" button is pressed. Loads the preparation view and sets it as the current scene.
      Specified by:

    • handleContinue

      public void handleContinue(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event when the "Continue Play" button is pressed. Attempts to load previously saved game data from files and switch to the game scene.
      Specified by:
      handleContinue in interface IStartViewController
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the button.
